DOC.brief_summary: This randomise controlled trial aim investigate efficacy cabbage leaf cataplasm treatment primary symptomatic osteoarthritis knee . 81 patient randomise one 3 group apply either cabbage leaf cataplasm diclofenac gel daily 4 week receive usual care . Efficacy measure use questionnaire pain , disability , quality life pressure pain sensitivity .
DOC.criteria: osteoarthritis knee , Kellgren Lawrence stadium 23 least 50 % day complaints initial pain intensity 45mm 100mm visual analoge scale medication corticoid immunsupressing drug secondary arthritis/arthrosis operation knee within 12 month prior injection within 4 week ( cortison ) 6 month prior ( hyaluronic acid ) severe comorbidities ( liver , kidney , asthma , psychiatric disorder etc . ) participation study pregnancy , breastfeed
